DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study develop adaptive ( AI ) micro-incentive ( MI ) intervention test static ( SI ) delayed-incentive ( DI ) intervention 4-arm randomized factorial trial increase MVPA adoption maintenance among inactive adult . Using neighborhood walkability socioeconomic status , participant recruit four neighborhood type : `` high walkable/high SES , '' `` high walkable/low SES , '' `` low walkable/high SES , '' `` low walkable/low SES . '' We evaluate synergistic antagonistic effect intervention neighborhood factor MVPA adoption 12 month maintenance 24 month .
DOC.brief_title: WalkIT Arizona : Walking Interventions Through Texting
DOC.criteria: woman men races/ethnicities live Maricopa County , Arizona Live one eligible neighborhood quadrant Maricopa County , Arizona Adult men woman 18 60 year old Inactive screen International Physical Activity Questionnaire ( IPAQ ) short form confirm baseline accelerometer measure No history heart failure type 2 diabetes No contraindication exercise test requirement medically supervise exercise ( assessed Physical Activity Readiness Questionnaire+ ( PARQ+ ) . Not currently pregnant plan become pregnant next 2 year Not currently participate physical activity , diet , weight loss program Daily access mobile phone text message capability iOS Android smartphone Willing wear small accelerometer wrist daily 1 year Willing send receive 23 text message per day 1 year Not plan outside Maricopa County > 30 day consecutively next 2 year Not plan move current home next 2 year
